media:group.media:title: The Task of Theology!

In this video Kyle introduces the task of theology.

Recommended Resources:
Peter C. Hodgson and Robert H. King, eds.  Christian Theology: An Introduction to Its Traditions and Tasks. Minneapolis: Fortress Press, 1994. http://amzn.to/2FU492v (affiliate)

Serene Jones and Paul Lakeland, eds.  Constructive Theology: A Contemporary Approach to Classical Themes. Minneapolis: Fortress Press, 2005. http://amzn.to/2BdA62g (affiliate)
